Blu Atlas, Restorative Eye stick, anti-aging & rejuvenating

Brand: Blu Atlas

Category: Around Eye Cream
book: 1360-Blu Atlas, Restorative Eye stick, anti-aging & rejuvenating

chunk: Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Coffea Canephora Seed (Caffeine) Extract, Dunaliella Salina (Algae) Extract, Polycitronellol Acetate, Niacinamide (Vitamin B3), Squalane, Hydroxypropyl Guar, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Sodium Phytate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin
book: 1360-Blu Atlas, Restorative Eye stick, anti-aging & rejuvenating

chunk:
Directions: Apply by gently moving the roller ball in a circular motion across the affected areas. Use daily for full effects.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
book: 1360-Blu Atlas, Restorative Eye stick, anti-aging & rejuvenating
